title: Channel24.co.za | Caitlyn Jenner to write a memoir
text:
Caitlyn Jenner to write a memoir 2015-10-23 15:00 Caitlyn Jenner at the ESPY Awards. (AP Photos) Related Links 
Los Angeles - Caitlyn Jenner is reportedly set to write a memoir. 
The 65-year-old former Olympian has been approached by a number of publishers who are keen to have her write about her personal journey. 
A source told Us Weekly: "They want her to do a memoir. 
"Caitlyn is in a really great place right now. She's very happy. Life is good." 
Meanwhile it was recently revealed that Caitlyn is set to go on a speaking tour. 
She will appear in five cities for the Unique Lives and Experiences show, which gives women a platform to reach out to others in the United States of America and Canada. 
It has not yet been confirmed what topics the television personality will be discussing but with the title of her speech, Up Close and Personal , it is likely she will open up about her life and how it has changed over the last year. Read more on: caitlyn jenner | celebrities NEXT ON CHANNEL24 X
